chatSystemNetwork

Class ChatNI

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatSystemIHMs.View
      • chatSystemNetwork.ChatNI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FromRemoteApp, ToRemoteApp, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class ChatNI
extends View
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer, FromRemoteApp, ToRemoteApp
    this class handles all the network classes
    Author:
    joanna

      • run

        public void run()
        launch the datagram receiver and then check sends Hello periodically. if the local user disconnects it stops the datagram receiver and cleans the NICache
